Articles.Content:
I mostly want to edit the science parts so they only require transmitting once, but will scale the data size to consume the same amount of power when transmitted.

I found the config option "xmitDataScalar" but I don't see one that modifies the data size, can anyone help?
You might need to edit the resource configuration files to get what you want, not sure...
I tried editing the .cfg for the part, thats where I found the scalar option. Is there another location for it?
Did you check the communication parts? The configs for those have some values near the bottom that set transmit values.
